name: Petal Pink Shoe Bag
description:
• Exquisite petite bags for your emerging ballerina or budding shoe fashionista!  This bag is made of soft white eyelet cotton with pretty pink and lime colored flower petals scattered throughout. 

• Little Miss Bhold Shoe Bags are lined and made with a separator inside the bag to keep each shoe protected individually.  Atop the bag, two drawstrings, finished with beautiful wooden beads, are used for easy closure and pretty design of the bags.  

• Little Miss Bhold Shoe Bags are 14.5” long and 9” wide to accommodate shoes to fit ages 5 – 12 before moving up to the regular Bhold Shoe Bags.

• The Petal Pink Shoe Bag was designed in mind to be the perfect gift for the important role of flower girl in any wedding party.  

• Proudly designed and made in Canada.  

• The Petal Pink design is limited edition so order early to avoid disappointment.

name: Desert Camo Man Shoe Bag
description:
• Every well heeled man needs an equally stylish bag to protect those about town or active shoes.

• Made of durable yet soft cotton to satisfy the demands of performance without compromising on fashion of sizzling hot desert fatigues.  

• A Bhold Man Shoe bag made expressly to keep his footwear in mint condition, whether in transit or stored safely in the closet.  

• Bhold Man Shoe Bags are lined and made with a separator of black cotton inside the bag to keep each shoe protected individually.  A drawstring with a cord lock is used to allow for easy and secure closure of the shoe bag. 

• Each Bhold Man Shoe bag is 18" long and 13" wide to accommodate a wide range of shoe styles and sizes.  

• Unique and versatile, Bhold Shoe Bags make wonderful gifts to be given as wine bags, too.

• Proudly designed and made in Canada.  

• The Desert Camo Man design is very limited edition so order early to avoid disappointment.

name: Laguna Beach Shoe Bag
description:
• Exquisite bag for exquisite shoes!  This bag is made of lush cotton featuring laid back blue stripes and bringing back those carefree memories of southern California.

• Bhold Shoe Bags are lined and made with a separator inside the bag to keep each shoe protected individually.  Atop the bag, two drawstrings are used for easy closure and classy design of the bags.  

• Bhold Shoe Bags are 17.5” long and 11” wide to accommodate the most stunning designer shoes.  

• Unique and versatile, Bhold Shoe Bags make wonderful gifts to be given as wine bags and lingerie bags, too.

• Perfect bag to be used if you were going to the beach wearing flip flops but needing your dance shoes close-by when the sun goes down!

• Proudly designed and made in Canada.  

• The Laguna Beach design is very limited edition so order early to avoid disappointment.

name: Messenger Bag in Pewter
description:
• Where Fashion and Function meet!

• Pewter color uniquely created to reflect the essence of chic.

• Fabric is imported from Japan and made of a high quality blend of polyester (42%) and nylon (58%) to create a lightweight bag (80g) that is both strong and washable.

• The Bhold Messenger Bag can easily be stored within the inner small pouch to ensure ease of portability and accessibility--perfect to keep tucked into her purse until it is needed.  

• When fully expanded, the shopping bag is a generous size with dimensions of 16.25” high x 18/5” wide, holding up to 25 litres in capacity. 

• The messenger style single strap measures 38.5” long and fits comfortably across the body or over the shoulder.

• Proudly designed and made in Canada.

• Where Fashion and Function meet!

• Pewter color uniquely created to reflect the essence of chic.

• Fabric is imported from Japan and made of a high quality blend of polyester (42%) and nylon (58%) to create a lightweight bag (80g) that is both strong and washable.

• The Bhold 2 Handle Bag can easily be stored within the inner small pouch to ensure ease of portability and accessibility--perfect to keep tucked into her purse until it is needed.  

• When fully expanded, the shopping bag is a generous size with dimensions of 16.25” high x 18/5” wide, holding up to 25 litres in capacity. 

• The two handle straps measure 10” long each and fits comfortably over the shoulder.

• Proudly designed and made in Canada.
